item.title: When you wish upon a...
item.description: Star light, star bright, First star I see tonight; I wish I may, I wish I might Know if you are a Starlink satellite 2022 has been a year defined by corporations releasing products and services without any thought given to consequences or even such piffling factors as ethics and morality.

item.title: All things will die
item.description: The Guardian posted an article today looking at the impact and future of Metaâ€™s Metaverse project. It is not a good read if you are holding Meta stock but I guess nothing really has been for the last few months. What I found most interesting in the article were the comments from Meta vice-president Vishal Shah trying to get his staff and developers to use their own VR software.
